explanation: Cursor shows where next input appears. Blinking line in text. Or mouse pointer.
Clipboard holds cut/copied data temporarily. One item. Paste uses it.

answers: Click, hold, move to new location
explanation: Drag and drop - select, drag to new location, release. Move/copy.
Right-click opens context menu - options for selected item.

answers: Open apps, start button, system tray
explanation: Taskbar - open windows, Start, pinned apps, clock, system tray.
Desktop - main screen when OS loads. Icons, wallpaper, taskbar.
Folder organizes files. Can contain files and subfolders.
Path shows location. C: drive, Users folder, Doc. Backslash separates.
Deleted files go to Recycle Bin/Trash. Can restore. Empty = permanent delete.

answers: Link to file or program - not the file itself
explanation: Shortcut is link - arrow icon. Points to original. Deleting shortcut doesn't delete file.
Screenshot captures what's on screen. PrtScn, Snipping Tool, etc.
Task Manager - processes, CPU, memory, network. End unresponsive programs.

answers: Minimal mode - only essential drivers, troubleshooting
explanation: Safe Mode loads minimal. For troubleshooting - remove malware, fix drivers.
Defrag helps HDD. SSD doesn't need - no moving parts, wear from defrag.
Disk Cleanup removes temp files, recycle bin, cache. Frees space.

answers: Created by programs, can be deleted
explanation: Temp files - created by apps. Usually safe to delete. In Temp folder.
Cookie - small text file. Preferences, login state. First-party, third-party.
History - list of visited sites. Can be cleared. Privacy consideration.

answers: Link to webpage for quick access
explanation: Bookmark saves URL. Quick access later. Favorites in some browsers.

answers: New window that opens - often ads
explanation: Pop-up - new window. Often ads. Browsers have pop-up blockers.
Tabs - multiple pages in one window. Switch without separate windows.
Incognito - no local history/cookies. Sites can still track. Not anonymous.
Extension adds features - ad blocker, password manager. Install from store.
Pop-up blocker stops unwanted pop-ups. Can allow specific sites.
Download manager - pause, resume, schedule. Built-in or extension.
